title: Victims Information Line extended to 24/7 (Ministry for the Environment of New Zealand)
text: ( Source : Ministry for the Environment of New Zealand ) Victims of crime and their families now have access to greater support with the extension of the Victim 's Information Line , Justice Minister Amy Adams says. Established in 2008, the free
